EmailTemplate.name: Paris Air Show.2015 Brunch Invite.2015 Brunch Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date: Honeywell Brunch at Paris Air Show
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SAVE THE DATE
Paris Air Show 2015 Honeywell Brunch Sunday, 14 June 2015 11 a.m. to 2 p.m. Possibilities. Made Easy. Honeywell Aerospace invites you to an elegant Sunday brunch at one of the most extraordinary gastronomic hideaways in Paris. Please join us in celebrating innovation and possibilities of flight. Le Pré Catelan – Salons Bois de Boulogne Route de Suresnes 75016 Paris
*Invitation to follow
